title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
e) Say "We should stop using the parasites ..." when confronted by the camp. Say you want to buy Oskar the artist in the Zhentarim hideout (“Fine, I’ll buy him. How much?”) and then successfully persuade or intimidate his slaver (Brem) After buying Oskar (which gives Lae'zel approval down), call him your slave and say you don't make jokes with your slaves. Side with Elder Brithvar and kill Nere. Deceive the Goblins and fling the poo at the four guards.
